titlestmt.author: compiled by Carol King, Nancy Lyon, and staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 10:50

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The collection consists of reports, printed material, and ephemera relating to the political, economic, and social conditions in Kenya. Also included are photographs.

langmaterial.language: The materials are in English and Swahili.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred from the African Collection Curator.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright status for collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Kenya Collection (MS 1523). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Associated Materials
relatedmaterial.p: African Collection (MS 605); Pamphlet Collection (MS 1351); African Postcard Collection (MS 1575). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of reports, printed material, and ephemera relating to the political, economic, and social conditions in Kenya. Also included are photographs.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The material in the original accession is arranged chronologically, with photographs last. Additions to the collection may vary in arrangement.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

did.unittitle: Printed material concerning relations with Great Britain: includes colonial papers
East African Indian National Congress: addresses, resolutions, reports
Political organizations: documents; journals; printed material; reports
Government papers: documents; journals; printed material; reports
Institute of Current World Affairs: printed material
"The Marsabit Experiment": posters used to convey health messages, produced by UNICEF
University of Nairobi: reports and papers
Committee for the Release of Political Prisoners in Kenya: newsletters; release bulletins
"Habari: Bulletin of the Embassy of the Federal Republic of Germany"
"The Trial of Dedan Kimathi": theater program
United Movement for Democracy in Kenya (UMOJA): printed material
Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation: news bulletins
"On the Present Situation in Our Country": pastoral letter of the Catholic Bishops of Kenya
"Tom Mboya, Underdevelopment, and I," by Ali A. Mazrui: essay by professor of political science at Makere University College (Kampula, Kenya)
East Africa: photograph album by E. Gladden
"The Undugu Story," by Ezra Mbogori: booklet about the street children of Nairobi and Father Arnold Grol's rehabilitation program
"Jaramogi Oginga Odinga: the Passing of a Hero": memorial tribute
Correspondence pertaining to the grave of the Duke of Aosta, Italian viceroy
Photograph album of F.W. Brett [private secretary to governor of Kenya from 1912-1915]
Travel diary of Mrs. R. Hepburn [includes photographs]
"Reports on the Kikuyu," by Jeanne M. Fisher [carbon typescript], Volume I, reports 1-4
"Reports on the Kikuyu," Volume II, reports 5-6 [bound in reverse order]
Flyers promoting the "Free Jomo Kenyatta" appeal
"Kenya, What are the facts?" (Communist Party, London)
"Release the Political Prisoners in Kenya" (Committee for the Release of Political Prisoners in Kenya)
Election material [pictures of candidate, flag, visor]
Selected periodicals [listing of random issues of individual titles in the box]
African Medical and Research Foundation (AMRF) and East African Flying Doctor Services, newsletter, no. 12
Goethe Institut Nairobi, Jambo Umlaut , no. 5
Historical Association of Kenya, newsletter, minutes from 1985 annual general meeting
Kenya Woman , special issue on the death of Mzee Jomo Kenyatta
Operation Firimbi, The Campaign Against Public-land Grabbing in Kenya, "Firimbi," no.1
"Wajibu, Social Change: Are Women Actors or Spectators?" vol. 3, no. 2

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The material is arranged as received from the source.

did.unittitle: Undugu Society of Kenya: Annual Report for the year
Kenya National Council of Social Service (Sharing Approaches at Work)
Map and Guide: the streets of Mombasa Island
Photographs of Jomo Kenyatta, prime minister and president of Kenya
